name: Escape From Maze
description:
Introduction

Escape from Maze is a 3dr person maze game where the objective of the player is to escape from the maze. But things are not as easy as it sounds! Players not only have to find the correct route, but also collect all three of keys hidden in other parts of the maze, to open the gate once they reach the escape route. Now the question is, will you take the challenge?

Info

This game was built with Unreal Engine 4.20 using the blueprints for visual scripting. The modelling was done using sketchup.

Note

This game is made by me and therefore reserve all copyrights to this game.
